entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:07 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
